description: I. Briefing document on environmental stresses from climate change. [Undated]. 17 p. II. Environmental stresses from detailed climate model simulations for the Middle East and Gulf region. March 2007. 39 p. III. Impacts of mean sea level rise based on current state-of-the-art modelling. department: Hadley Centre for Climate Prediction and Research Ministry of Defence Met Office
